title: Today is my Birthday
body:
anyone want to play a game with me? i dont want to be carried, just have fun on the most un-fun day of my life. 
single with noone to mingle with...

replies.body:
Shout out to Riot KateyKhaos (NA)
for making my birthday the best ever!

Happy Birthday! 

I should be around (aside from Valentine's Day dinner stuff), let's find a time to play! :D

Your birthday is Valentines?

Well happy birthday :)
Happy Birthday. I don't play LoL anymore so happy birthday wishes are all I can offer.

Ducktales, it was your birthday?

Its my friends birthday too, haha.

Happy Birthday man/lass/variation there upon! Hope your day continues to be swell!

You shouldn't really care about if your birthday is on Valentines. Screw all the couples, you can and should be happy by yourself :)
I would totally play with you, but it would have to be on EUW.

Happy birthday man!
You always have your sister... huehueuu incest huehueuheu
